alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Portage; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 6:03PM EDT until June 01 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Central Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Southeastern Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 602 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Garrettsville, or 13 miles northeast of Ravenna, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Warren, Cortland, Garrettsville, Kinsman, West Farmington, Bristolville, Vienna Center, Leavittsburg, Girard, Parkman, Vienna, Mecca, Johnston, Hiram, Orangeville, Yankee Lake, Brookfield Center, Howland Center, West Hill and Champion Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
